name: Picacho Coffee Roasters
address:
200 Conway Ave. Unit: A
Las Cruces, NM 88005

roasts.name: Espresso Spadafora
roasts.tasting_notes: Tasty classic ristretto. Buttery, chocolate, thick.

roasts.name: Colombia Supremo Bucaramanga Santander
roasts.tasting_notes: Darker than I expected, but not outside the advertised roast level. Too dark for my taste in drip, but makes an interesting single origin espresso. As espresso, buttery, roasty, heavy and peppery.
